author: nick
msg: Start trying to get the Tika OSGi tests to run, by splitting them out by area, explicitly using an OSGi test running, and beginning to check that in-bundle and non-bundle have the same parsers and detectors. Many tests disabled though as broken... TIKA-1276

msg: TIKA-1303 skip bogus second title tag

author: nick
msg: To support OSGi testing, allow for a test class to find out what class names ServiceLoader.loadStaticServiceProviders will try, helps TIKA-1276
